text: Luxurious robes, fit for those who do not tread the battlefield.
Lady Liu always cares about her family.
For farmers, they are higher than the emperor.
Those who intervene instead of the lord.
They get everything down to a note.
Your attendant will replenish the regional army.
Your attendant will support your army in enemy territory.
Your attendant will help to expand the settlement.
Those who toil the land require more utilitarian approaches.
This is the basic way to correct corruption.
All must take up their tools and participate in the enormous effort of rebuilding society.
Martial expertise from hard work. Practice. Preparation. Endless repetition.
A hero's resolve is not to seem the bravest, but to be it.
Be cunning and full of tricks and your people shall never be destroyed.
Concentrate on the moment: fight, don't think. Use your instincts.
The responsibility that comes with authority should not be taken lightly.
